MiniTest Events

05 Dec 2010

tweet! subscribe!

A few weeks ago I made a hack to MiniTest to add Fuubar-like functionality. Unfortunately the hack was a little dirty, and I wanted to make MiniTest more extendable, at least for reporting purposes. My solution was to borrow from the Events system I wrote for Harbor (a web framework we wrote at my day job at Wieck Media).
